prop.name: orderDate
prop.desc: Date order was placed.

prop.name: paymentDue
prop.desc: The date that payment is due.

prop.name: orderNumber
prop.desc: The identifier of the transaction.

prop.name: paymentUrl
prop.desc: The URL for sending a payment.

prop.name: orderStatus
prop.desc: The current status of the order.

prop.name: billingAddress
prop.desc: The billing address for the order.

prop.name: partOfInvoice
prop.desc: The order is being paid as part of the referenced Invoice.

prop.name: confirmationNumber
prop.desc: A number that confirms the given order or payment has been received.

prop.name: customer
prop.desc: Party placing the order or paying the invoice.

prop.name: merchant
prop.desc: 'merchant' is an out-dated term for 'seller'.

prop.name: broker
prop.desc: An entity that arranges for an exchange between a buyer and a seller.  In most cases a broker never acquires or releases ownership of a product or service involved in an exchange.  If it is not clear whether an entity is a broker, seller, or buyer, the latter two terms are preferred.

prop.name: isGift
prop.desc: Was the offer accepted as a gift for someone other than the buyer.

prop.name: paymentMethod
prop.desc: The name of the credit card or other method of payment for the order.

prop.name: seller
prop.desc: An entity which offers (sells / leases / lends / loans) the services / goods.  A seller may also be a provider.

prop.name: paymentMethodId
prop.desc: An identifier for the method of payment used (e.g. the last 4 digits of the credit card).

prop.name: discount
prop.desc: Any discount applied (to an Order).

prop.name: orderDelivery
prop.desc: The delivery of the parcel related to this order or order item.

prop.name: orderedItem
prop.desc: The item ordered.

prop.name: acceptedOffer
prop.desc: The offer(s) -- e.g., product, quantity and price combinations -- included in the order.

prop.name: discountCurrency
prop.desc: The currency (in 3-letter ISO 4217 format) of the discount.

prop.name: paymentDueDate
prop.desc: The date that payment is due.

prop.name: discountCode
prop.desc: Code used to redeem a discount.
